text: Generation of polyclonal antibodies specific for the SARS-CoV 3a protein. A synthetic peptide corresponding to residues 11 to 24 of the SARS-CoV 3a protein (C-ESITAQPVKIDNAS) was generated and used to immunize two rabbits (Biogenes, Berlin, Germany) according to the standard protocol of the supplier. Serums were collected at 45 dpi and evaluated by enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA) and immunofluorescence and Western blot analysis using Vero E6 cells infected with SARS-CoV-wt or SARS-CoV-Î”3a as a negative control.
